thread.title: BRIEF-Cadence Bancorp Sets $37.5 Mln Termination fee on State Bank Deal

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Cadence Bancorp Sets $37.5 Mln Termination fee on State Bank Deal
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Cadence Bancorp:
* CADENCE BANCORP SAYS FEE OF $37.5 MILLION WILL BE PAYABLE BY STATE BANK UPON DEAL TERMINATION UNDER CERTAIN CIRCUMSTANCES - SEC FILING
* CADENCE BANCORP - EXPENSE REIMBURSEMENT AMOUNT OF $2 MILLION WILL BE PAYABLE BY CO UPON DEAL TERMINATION UNDER CERTAIN CIRCUMSTANCES Source text ( bit.ly/2GaIT7P ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
